title: Rati Haaram: Exquisite Ruby and Diamond Cascade Necklace
materials: Faceted Oval-Cut Rubies. Features a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning necklace features a contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. Delicate geometric links are adorned with shimmering diamonds and rich red rubies. The central pendant showcases a cascading design, culminating in a single, vibrant ruby teardrop. Meticulously crafted with precision and attention to detail.
occasions: and elegant modern events. Also suitable for a sophisticated evening out.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The captivating combination of rubies and diamonds adds a touch of regal elegance. Made with high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship, ensuring lasting beauty and value. A timeless piece that will become a cherished heirloom.
